title: Journal
description: A simple journal format which is three type. Morning, evening or daily action.

isDreamed.description: answer of DID YOU DREAM? question.

moodScore.description: The circled face icon. If first its 1 if last its 5. In the MOOD TRACKER: section

moodFactor.description: answer of What do you think contributed to your mood today? question.

dayliThought.description: answer of What is one unique thought or insight you had today? question. In the THOUGHT FOR THE DAY section

impacts.description: answer of How can this insight change your perspective or actions? question. In the THOUGHT FOR THE DAY section

wentWell.description: answer of Reflect on why these things went well? question. In the WHAT WENT WELL section

changes.description: answer of What steps can you take to make this change happen? question. In the CHANGES FOR TOMORROW section

affirmations.description: the text after I AM. which is in the POSITIVE AFFIRMATIONS block

gratefulFor.description: the text after I AM GRATEFUL FOR: numeric

excitedAbout.description: the text after I AM EXCITED ABOUT: numeric

isDailyActionCompleted.description: answer of Did you complete todayâ€™s daily gratitude action?

dscription.description: paragraph after If yes, how did it make you feel to express gratitude? question. In Daily Action TRACKING section

dreamMagics.description: the text after I AM. which is in the DREAM MAGIC block
